coreAttributes.name: shuriken
coreAttributes.description: A six-pointed throwing star meant as a fast striking ranged dagger attack. Its body consisting of metal with the tips sharp, enchanted with arcane energy.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] shuriken and [npc.verb(prepare)] to throw it.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Hurling [npc.her] shuriken at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.herHim] square in the chest!
Throwing [npc.her] shuriken at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike [npc2.herHim] on the [npc.arm(true)]!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(launch)] [npc.her] shuriken at [npc2.name] and [npc.verb(succeed)] in hitting [npc2.herHim]!

missDescriptions.missText: Throwing [npc.her] shuriken at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(launch)] [npc.her] shuriken at [npc2.name], but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!

oneShotEndTurnRecoveryDescriptions.recoveryText: Using their speed, [npc.name] rushes forward and retrieves [npc.her] shuriken, allowing [npc.herHim] to reuse it!
